verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050> Praise <WH1984> the name <WH8034> of the Lord; <WH3068> Praise <WH1984> Him, O servants <WH5650> of the Lord, <WH3068>
You who <WH7945> stand <WH5975> in the house <WH1004> of the Lord, <WH3068> In the courts <WH2691> of the house <WH1004> of our God! <WH430>
Praise <WH1984> the Lord, <WH3050> for the Lord <WH3068> is good; <WH2896> Sing <WH2167> praises <WH2167> to His name, <WH8034> for it is lovely. <WH5273>
For the Lord <WH3050> has chosen <WH977> Jacob <WH3290> for Himself, Israel <WH3478> for His own possession. <WH5459>
For I know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> is great, <WH1419> And that our Lord <WH136> is above <WH4480> all <WH3605> gods. <WH430>
Whatever <WH3605> <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> pleases, <WH2654> He does, <WH6213> In heaven <WH8064> and in earth, <WH776> in the seas <WH3220> and in all <WH3605> deeps. <WH8415>

He causes the vapors <WH9347> to ascend <WH5927> from the ends <WH7097> of the earth; <WH776> Who makes <WH6213> lightnings <WH1300> for the rain; <WH4306> Who brings <WH3318> forth <WH3318> the wind <WH7307> from His treasuries. <WH214>
He smote <WH5221> the first-born of Egypt, <WH4714> Both <WH4480> of man <WH120> and beast. <WH929>
He sent <WH7971> signs <WH226> and wonders <WH4159> into your midst, <WH8432> O Egypt, <WH4714> Upon Pharaoh <WH6547> and all <WH3605> his servants. <WH5650>
He smote <WH5221> many <WH7227> nations, <WH1471> And slew <WH2026> mighty <WH6099> kings, <WH4428>
Sihon, <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> And Og, <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> And all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> of Canaan; <WH3667>
And He gave <WH5414> their land <WH776> as a heritage, <WH5159> A heritage <WH5159> to Israel <WH3478> His people. <WH5971>
Thy name, <WH8034> O Lord, <WH3068> is everlasting, <WH5769> Thy remembrance, <WH2143> O Lord, <WH3068> throughout all <WH1755> generations. <WH1755>
For the Lord <WH3068> will judge <WH1777> His people, <WH5971> And will have <WH5162> compassion <WH5162> on His servants. <WH5650>
The idols <WH6091> of the nations <WH1471> are [but] silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> The work <WH4639> of man's hands. <WH3027>
They have mouths, <WH6310> but they do not speak; <WH1696> They have eyes, <WH5869> but they do not see; <WH7200>
They have ears, <WH241> but they do not hear; <WH238> Nor <WH369> is there <WH3426> any <WH3426> breath <WH7307> at all <WH637> in their mouths. <WH6310>
Those who make <WH6213> them will be like <WH3644> them, [Yes,] everyone <WH3605> who <WH834> trusts <WH982> in them.
O house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> bless <WH1288> the Lord; <WH3068> O house <WH1004> of Aaron, <WH175> bless <WH1288> the Lord; <WH3068>
O house <WH1004> of Levi, <WH3878> bless <WH1288> the Lord; <WH3068> You who revere <WH3372> the Lord, <WH3068> bless <WH1288> the Lord. <WH3068>
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord <WH3068> from Zion, <WH6726> Who dwells <WH7931> in Jerusalem. <WH3389> Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050>
